item.description:
Please RSVP!

 

We will resume lessons from IBD next month.  This month we have a special program.  Mark Awad has done some research on how well IBD's Market Pulse has fared as a bellweather of the market over the last 7 years.  He will be presenting his findings.

Kier McDonough will share some of his long and deep experience with CANSLIM. 

If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come.

 
Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: Mark Awad - 7 Years of Market Pulse & Kier McDonough - CANSLIM Miscellany
